snippet: China’s central bank made the announcement on its website, saying that the one-year bank lending rate would drop 0.25 percentage point to 5.35 percent.
abstract: China's central bank reduces one-year lending rate to 5.35 percent, drop of .25 percentage point, and drops deposit rates by quarter percentage point in effort to boost economy.
lead_paragraph: China’s central bank made the announcement on its website, saying that the one-year bank lending rate would drop 0.25 percentage point to 5.35 percent.

headline.main: China Cuts Interest Rates to Stimulate Slowing Economy
headline.print_headline: China Cuts Interest Rates to Spur a Slowing Economy
